Shop App

{{ (myCart$ | async)?.length }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { StoreService } from 'src/app/services/store.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent { viewCart: boolean = false; myCart$ = this.storeService.myCart$; constructor(private storeService: StoreService) { } onToggleCart() { this.viewCart = !this.viewCart }; }
